Html:
Hello,

Is it possible to create a button Excel which execute a code from .NET ? Currently, I know how to create a ribbon thanks to examples but there are no example which done my need..

I know that create a button is possible with :
Excel.Shape refresh = workSheetGroupingTest.Shapes.AddFormControl(XlFormControl.xlButtonControl, 3, 3, 100, 18);
but how can i write a code which will be execute when the button will be clicked ?

Thanks for your job,

Thomas
The code I posted here works for me. Note: The code uses ActiveX and not form buttons.
